TopicTitle: What a time to stumble upon this. Also: Hi.

Articles.Content:
Hello there, kerbonauts!

I found KSP on steam and got totally hooked on it. A great and refreshing game concept. ( i didn't quite believe that it was an alpha-state version). To get a thing out of the way first: English is not my native tongue, so if i get sentence fragments confused, use impossible conditionals and stuff like that, feel free to correct me in a constructive way.(i don't think it's gonna be a problem)

Several probes are orbiting, a probe-rover has landed on the Mun, i still need to get better at rocket building, as they seem to collapse under their weight, dont have the thrust or the fuel for my needs.

So far, the only mod i installed was RemoteTech (and that only recently) because as soon as i saw the sat-dishes i imagined them functioning. I hope they don't become unused doodads.

i wanted to register just the day everything here went offline. So, here i am finally!
Welcome! RemoteTech is great just wait till you find yourself on other planets with 5+ minute delays on your probes
if i get some command stations out there, +5 minute delays won't happen ( but i think even 10 seconds are gonna cost me some nerves)

I watched a guy using it with a 3 minute delay but he had another mod which he could use a computer to toggle thrust at specific times, so he would hands free perform manoeuvres with the time delay

Can't remember the mod D:
doesnt remotetech come with a flight computer that can do maneuvers?

doesnt remotetech come with a flight computer that can do maneuvers?

Possibly
